page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: Our 'D' block serves quite different housing needs. On the western side, near the Browndown Training Camp there are two caravan parks.Each of the parks are maintained by Gosport Borough Council and serve as both a permanent home and a seasonal base for both residents and holidaymakers. Behind the Stanley Park caravan parks and the Stanley Recreation park is a large residential area. There are many large detached houses built in the early part of the century and there is more modern development where people have sold off their extensive gardens. The old Alvercliff house is now a retirement and rest home for former Royal Navy personnel and is an attractive development within the original wallls of the old house.
